Quickstride looks to both Windlord and Rodimus and then heaves a sigh. He k=
new of one individual who could have possibly helped everyone in this situa=
tion.  One that could teach everyone how to clear their minds.  The same me=
ch who also trained Prowl, Tucson, Straight Shot and Nightshift.  

"Master=
 Yokitron would definitely have been a big help ta all of us.  He often tra=
ined distressed warriors as yourselves how ta clear one's mind to purge it =
of impure thoughts that may overcome them.  He did that through meditation.=
  Surrounding one's soul with a peaceful environment where one could find i=
nner peace.  That's what everyone needs, inner peace."

He smiles to Rodimu=
s, Windlord and Lord Elder, who he just happens to notice.  

" Ah, Lord El=
der, please join us.  I was just telling these guys about Master Yokitron a=
nd how he used ta help troubled mechs through meditation.  I think we could=
 all use a little bit of that, huh?"

Perpetually on the move and constantl=
y busy. 

On Jul 1, 2011, at 2:00 PM, Airshadow Nightstar <airly2002@hotmai=
l.com> wrote:

> Windlord:
>  
> Windlord looked at Rodimus and Quickstride=
 and said =E2=80=9CIt=E2=80=99s consuming me, and i dont like to become wha=
t Hydras attemped to do with us... I dont know what to do to make it stop..=
. I need help but I dont know at whom ask it, my only purpose now is retrib=
ution but I dont like that it consume what remains of my old self=E2=80=9D
=

> Quickstride puts a friendly arm around Windlord with a gent=
ile look on his face.
>  
> " I definitely know how ya feel.  There's times=
 when it was okay ta smash someone's snout in with a good, swift kick of my=
 hind hooves, but not now.  But things have a way of working out on their o=
wn.  Some call it karma.  What they do ta others, eventually comes back ta =
them.  And all we need ta do is sit back and let that happen.  Hydras is go=
nna get it big time.  I see it in Tucson Prime's face.  He means business a=
nd he won't give up till that miserable lizard is dealt with accordingly.  =
"
> 
> Perpetually on the move and constantly busy.
>

 2:26 AM, Airshadow Nightstar <airly2002@...> wrote:
>

done us...  And mad at myself for all the  troubles that I tried to create =
for Rodimus and Nighlight, But the worse of all is... I ENJOYED  TO DO ALL =
THAT CHAOS!! =E2=80=9Dsaid Windlord almost with despair =E2=80=9CThe sensas=
ion to act without balance and restain was... overhelming... And now it=E2=
=80=99s hard to for me to keep it in check...  But I want to do something u=
sefull with my rage and give the Preds a payback=E2=80=9D
>>
